S.FORM: ɕɯŋgɯ tɕe tɕendɤre mdzadi ci pjɤ-tu
zrɯɣ ci pjɤ-tu tɕe tɕendɤre tɯ-tɯkha ku-rɤʑi-ndʑi pjɤ-ŋu.
tɕendɤre tɯ-sŋi tɕe tɕendɤre,
kɯ-ʑŋgi lu-ɕe-ndʑi pjɤ-ŋu
kɯ-ʑŋgi lu-ɕe-ndʑi pjɤ-ŋu tɕe tɕendɤre,
tamar, tɯkri tɯ-khɯtsa pjɤ-tu,
rlɯm ku-tshi-ndʑi ɲɤ-sɯso-ndʑi ri,
tɕeri tɯ-khɯtsa ma pjɤ-me.
tɕe to-nɯkrɤz-ndʑi.
tɕe ɕɯ kɯ-ʑŋgi ʑa thɯ-kɯ-sɤzɣɯt nɯ ɣɯ kú-wɣ-tshi tu-omɯti-ndʑi
tɕendɤre "ɣa" tu-omɯti-ndʑi tɕendɤre,
lo-ɕe-ndʑi tɕe tɕendɤre ndʑi-fkur pjɤ-βzu-ndʑi.
ndʑi-fkur pjɤ-βzu-ndʑi tɕe
预备起 to-ti-ndʑi tɕe tɕendɤre chɤ-ɣi-ndʑi.
mdzadi kɯ "ʑa aʑo tu-ndze-a" ɲɤ-sɯso rcanɯ,
maka ɯ-fkur to-fkur tɕe,
ko-nɯmdar nɤ ɲɤ-nɯmdar, ko-nɯmdar nɤ ɲɤ-nɯmdar,
ɯ-fkur li pjɯ-mbɯt, li tu-βze li nɤ chɯ-ɣi
tɕeri, nɤki nɯnɯ, tɤ-mda tɕe tɕe, mɯ-pjɤ-mbjom ma pjɤ-ɣɤβlo.
zrɯɣ nɯnɯ lɯznɤlɯz chɯ-ɣi tɕe tɕendɤre
mɯ-pjɤ-mbjom kɯ-fse ri, ɯ-fkur ra mɯ-pjɤ-mbɯt,
tɕe ʑatsa kha chɤ-zɣɯt.
kha chɤ-zɣɯt tɕe tɯkri tɯkhɯtsa nɯ ko-ɕkɯt.
ko-ɕkɯt tɕe tɕendɤre, nɤki,
mdzadi thɯ-ɣe tɕe "tɕhindʐa, nɤki nmnɯ, tɯkri nɯ kɤ-tɯ-ɕkɯt?" to-ti tɕe,
"wo nɯ, nɯ ɕkɯt-a ɕti matɕi tɤ-nɯkrɤz-tɕi ɕti,
iʑo "ɕɯ ʑa thɯ-kɯ-zɣɯt nɯ kɯ tshi-tɕi"
tɤ-tɯt-tɕi ɕti tɕe,
aʑo ndɤre ʑa thɯ-azɣɯt-a tɕe kɤ-tshi-t-a ja " to-ti.
tɕe mdzadi nɯ kɯ ɕɯmɯrdom lo-mɟa tɕe,
nɤki nɯnɯ, zrɯɣ ɣɯ ɯ-mphɯz ko-rtɤβ ɲɯ-ŋu.
tɕe zrɯɣ ɣɯ ɯ-mphɯz kɯ-ɣɯrni nɯ mdzadi kɯ, iɕqha nɤkinɯ, ɕɯmɯrdom kɤ-kɤ-rtɤβ kɯ nɯ-kɤ-sɤβzu tu-kɯ-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
